original_text: I am very happy, because of what the Lord, my God, has done. 61: In verses 10-11, it is probably Zion (Jerusalem) that is speaking on behalf of the nation of God's people. I have so much joy! He has given salvation to me, like clothes that I can wear all the time. I have his righteousness as my coat! He makes me handsome, like a bridegroom who wears a priest's hat. He makes me beautiful, like a bride who wears her jewels. I am very happy, because of what the Lord, my God, has done. 61: In verses 10-11, it is probably Zion (Jerusalem) that is speaking on behalf of the nation of God's people. I have so much joy! He has given salvation to me, like clothes that I can wear all the time. I have his righteousness as my coat! He makes me handsome, like a bridegroom who wears a priest's hat. He makes me beautiful, like a bride who wears her jewels. I am very happy,
korean_text: 내가 여호와로 말미암아 크게 기뻐하며 내 영혼이 나의 하나님으로 말미암아 즐거워하리니 이는 그가 구원의 옷을 내게 입히시며 공의의 겉옷을 내게 더하심이 신랑이 사모를 쓰며 신부가 자기 보석으로 단장함 같게 하셨음이라

sentences.original_text: because of what the Lord, my God, has done
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 주 하나님이 행하신 일 때문에

sentences.original_text: on behalf of the nation of God's people
He has given salvation to me
like clothes that I can wear all the time
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 항상 입을 수 있는 옷처럼

sentences.original_text: I have his righteousness as my coat!
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그의 의를 내 겉옷으로 삼았습니다!

sentences.original_text: like a bridegroom who wears a priest's hat
like a bride who wears her jewels
